summary: A chronicle of Terri Hooley's life, a record-store owner instrumental in developing Belfast's punk-rock scene.
cast: Jodie Whittaker|Richard Dormer|Liam Cunningham|Dylan Moran|Adrian Dunbar|Killian Scott|Kerr Logan|David Wilmot|Ruth McCabe|Karl Johnson|Conor MacNeill|Andrew Simpson|Mark Ryder|Michael Colgan|Patrick O'Kane|Diarmuid Noyes|Demetri Goritsas|Patrick FitzSymons|Richard Clements|Niall Wright|Chris Patrick-Simpson|Ryan McParland|Niall Cusack|Joanna Croll|Richard Doubleday|Mary Lindsay|John Travers|Una Carroll|Mark Asante|Paul Caddell|Shane McCaffrey|James Tolcher|Laura Hughes|Allan Gildea|Colin Ash|Niketa Ferguson|Robert Render|Pierre Adeli|Richard Hill|Petesy Burns|James Lyttle|Steven Donnelly|Trevor Adams|Terri Hooley|Dorian Dixon|Allistair Wyndham|Cathal Maguire|Phillip Taggart|Emma Ryan|Niall Doherty|Claire Hannaway|Charlie Berkeley|Una C.|Joseph Donnelly|Rosalind Blair|Andrew Bleakley|Peter Kelly|Kieran Coyle|Brendan Reid
director: Directors: Lisa Barros D'Sa, Glenn Leyburn
title: Good Vibrations
